  • Method Details

    • createNewASAPTicket

      public Ticket createNewASAPTicket​(java.lang.Long storeId, User user)
      This method creates a new ASAP (As Soon As Possible) ticket. First of all, it queries the store, fetching all the available upcoming slots. Then, it checks if there are some bookings in the first slot and, in particular, if there is the possibility of retrieving other tickets. If true, it creates new Ticket and Booking instances.
      Parameters:
      storeId - the store in which the ASAP request has to be made.
      user - the user who requested the slot.
      Returns:
      a new Ticket instance if the creation is successful, null otherwise.

    • voidTicket

      public void voidTicket​(java.lang.Long ticketId)
      Void an existent ticket relying on its id.
      Parameters:
      ticketId - the id of the ticket to be voided.

    • getTicketById

      public Ticket getTicketById​(java.lang.Long ticketId)
      Parameters:
      ticketId - the id of the ticket to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      the Ticket object if present, null otherwise.

    • validateTicket

      public boolean validateTicket​(java.lang.String uuid)
      Validate a ticket through its unique id (uuid). This method is generally called from the attendants' smartphones, which read the users' tickets at the entrance of the supermarkets.
      Parameters:
      uuid - the unique id of the ticket to be validated.
      Returns:
      true if the validation is successful, false otherwise.

    • getTicketByUser

      public java.util.List<Ticket> getTicketByUser​(User user)
      Parameters:
      user - the user whose tickets has to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      his (her) tickets list.

    • getUpcomingTicketByStore

      public java.util.List<Ticket> getUpcomingTicketByStore​(Store store)
      Fetch all the upcoming tickets of a given store. It is generally used by store managers and attendants.
      Parameters:
      store - the store whose upcoming tickets have to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      the list of upcoming tickets.

    • handOutOnSpot

      public Ticket handOutOnSpot​(User user)
      This methods takes care of the procedure of handing a ticket on the spot, which is managed by the store attendant, in a proper store area.
      Parameters:
      user - the store attendant who made the request.
      Returns:
      the generated ticket.
